snippet.title: Valthirian Arc: Hero School Story 2 - Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Pre-Order Now: https://pqube.co.uk/games/valthirian-arc-hero-school-story-2/

Become the principal of a school for heroes, in this thrilling sim-management game! In the land of Valthiria, destiny is not a matter of birth, but a result of passion and training. Watch as your students transform, mastering their abilities under your expert guidance. Hold on tight as you unravel a captivating story over the course of an in-game decade, filled with unexpected twists. Get ready to forge a legacy like no other in Valthirian Arc Hero School Story 2!

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/
